name: Ruff 'N Tumble
description:
Welcome to Ruff N’ Tumble!

You are a smart little robot called Ruff. You rely on a generator to keep ticking. However, things aren’t lookin’ good hon. Wicked tumbleweeds are coming for your generator, desiring to harvest its power.

Build turrets to laser those weedy brutes before they can siphon power from your generator. When a tumbleweed dies, they will drop a coin. Collect these to build more turrets to improve your defense.

There’s a catch: you and your turrets are joined together. Once you leave the range of your generator or turret, your power will start to run out. Sprint to collect coins and place your turrets wisely.

You can stop some tumbleweeds, but they'll just keep coming. Fight them off for as long as you can!
